DataElement.preferredName: Total Normal Tissue Segment Comment Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A free text field to provide additional information regarding the entire non-neoplastic ("normal") adjacent tissue specimen that was divided into segments for proteomic and genomic analysis.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition._Sufficient total material from each patient, divided to yield a minimum of one aliquot, preferably divided into one to three aliquots of non-neoplastic ("normal") adjacent tissue (as feasible) suitable for processing for proteomic and genomic analysis._A written explanation, observation or criticism added to textual material.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.:Sufficient total material from each patient, divided to yield a minimum of one aliquot, preferably divided into one to three aliquots of non-neoplastic ("normal") adjacent tissue (as feasible) suitable for processing for proteomic and genomic analysis.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.

Tissue sample with cellular composition and architectural patterns expected for the particular anatomic site in which it belongs. There is no evidence of abnormal cellular infiltrates or tumor mass formation.

Property.preferredDefinition: A written explanation or criticism or illustration that is added to a book or other textual material.

Concepts.definition: A written explanation, observation or criticism added to textual material.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.

DataElementConcept.origin: CPTAC: Clinical Proteomic Tumor Analysis Consortium
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 2/12/21 jk Released per SME (NGM) review and approval.10/1/20 jk created for Solid Tumor Procurement CRF.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.

ValueDomain.origin: CPTAC: Clinical Proteomic Tumor Analysis Consortium
ValueDomain.changeDescription: 1/2/20 jk Released per CPTAC SME (Linda) for PRAD Baseline CRF.  8/6/19 jk created for multiple CPTAC CRFs.

DataElement.origin: CPTAC: Clinical Proteomic Tumor Analysis Consortium
DataElement.changeDescription: 2/12/21 jk  upd def per SME comment; upd Reg Status and released.  12/15/20 jk Removed Normal Tissue CSI; new CDE per SME for CRF.10/30/20 jk added Normal Tissue CSI. 10/1/20 jk created CPTAC Solid tumor procurement CRF.
